data: Go to VietNam r/VietNam • Casamance Português (Brasil) Русский 日本語 Čeština Italiano The original creator of Flappy Bird, Dong Nguyen, posts his first Tweet in over seven years to confirm that he has not sold his game to Gametech Holdings and has not been working with them on the new Flappy Bird game. x.com Open "No, I have no related with their game. I did not sell anything. I also don't support crypto." says Nguyen. Read more Share
